Source.Name: compsize
Source.Summary: compsize takes a list of files (given as arguments) on a btrfs filesystem and measures used compression types and effective compression ratio
Source.Description: compsize takes a list of files (given as arguments) on a btrfs filesystem and measures used compression types and effective compression ratio, producing a report.

Package.Name: compsize
Package.Summary: compsize takes a list of files (given as arguments) on a btrfs filesystem and measures used compression types and effective compression ratio
Package.Description: compsize takes a list of files (given as arguments) on a btrfs filesystem and measures used compression types and effective compression ratio, producing a report.
